  • SystemWrapper

Class SystemWrapper<SCHEMA>

Extend this class to create strongly typed A-Frame System. Like components, there are default implementations for component lifecycle methods such as init(), play(), pause(), and tick() that can be overridden. Additional Information on A-Frame systems can be found here: A-Frame Docs: System

example

export class NewSystem extends SystemWrapper {
   constructor() {
       super("new")

       new NewComponent().register()
   }
}
